name: US Industrial Pellet Association
goal:
The U.S. Industrial Pellet Association (USIPA) is a not for profit trade organization that promotes safety and sustainability practices within the US industrial-grade pellet industry, as well as the growth of the overall bioenergy market.

USIPA serves to provide a unified voice for the wood pellet industry on policy issues in the US and abroad, and supports biomass as a sustainable and stable source of renewable energy in growing markets around the world.

Our 60+ members represent the entire bioenergy supply chain, including all the major US industrial wood pellet producers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Renewable Energy Directive; renewable energy initiatives; energy market reform; climate change mitigation
